China's Guangzhou first to completely ease purchase limit on large homesChina's major southern city of Guangzhou fully relaxed home purchase limits for some people on Saturday and said it would increase affordable housing supply, in a move to support the local property market. Sat, 27 Jan 2024 04:37:53 GMT 4J4OWD3V4NOKBOQOZJB33P3VP4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-guangzhou-first-completely-ease-purchase-limit-large-homes-2024-01-27/Reuters世界中国
Boeing 737 MAX lands in China, ending import freeze on order backlogChina, which was the first country to ground MAX jets after two MAX 8 accidents in 2018 and 2019 that killed nearly 350 people. Sat, 27 Jan 2024 02:34:23 GMT QWKDTGRQ7ZN7PH2VAYV76CNE5M https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/boeing-737-max-lands-china-ending-import-freeze-order-backlog-2024-01-27/Lisa Barrington商业航空航天与国防
China's industrial profits fell 2.3% in 2023Profits at China's industrial firms fell 2.3% in 2023, their second straight yearly decline, due to sluggish demand at home and abroad, adding pressure on economic growth amid a deep property slump and deflationary risks. Sat, 27 Jan 2024 02:13:25 GMT GRJ2GRB77JKEXFMBIFJDCPSXDU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-induscial-profits-fell-23-2023-2024-01-27/Liangping Gao, Ryan Woo世界中国
Tuvalu's pro-Taiwan leader loses seat in national electionThe pro-Taiwan leader of the Pacific Islands nation of Tuvalu, Kausea Natano, lost his seat in an election closely watched by Taiwan, China and the U.S., results showed on Saturday. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 23:58:23 GMT KF4RR4LQRRNDBFAAF4RB5VBHXE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/tuvalus-pro-taiwan-leader-loses-seat-national-election-2024-01-26/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
North Korea, China agree to defend common interests as senior envoys meetNorth Korea and China agreed to strengthen tactical cooperation and defend common interests, the North's official KCNA news agency said on Saturday, reporting on Foreign Minister Choe Son Hui's meeting with Chinese Vice Foreign Minister Sun Weidong. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 21:50:43 GMT K7Q6FLOZCNIZLOQQIJM7NVFCPI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-china-agree-defend-common-interests-senior-envoys-meet-2024-01-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
China told US officials its banks 'doing well' despite financial turmoil, Yellen saysU.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said on Friday that Treasury officials visiting Beijing recently received assurances that Chinese banks are "doing well" despite turmoil in the country's financial and real estate markets, adding that she did not see large spillovers to the U.S. economy at this stage. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 19:35:14 GMT TK74WH3MLBOUVDXEP7MRCXLPRU https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/china-told-us-officials-its-banks-doing-well-despite-financial-turmoil-yellen-2024-01-26/David Lawder市场亚洲市场
Eying China, US proposes 'know your customer' cloud computing requirementsThe Biden administration is proposing requiring U.S. cloud companies to determine whether foreign entities are accessing U.S. data centers to train AI models, U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo said on Friday. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 18:52:34 GMT ODTBBB6W2NNVZICYV5JCIR73LY https://www.reuters.com/technology/us-propose-know-your-customer-requirements-cloud-computing-companies-2024-01-26/David Shepardson可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Red Sea, China risks to US economy seem contained, White House saysThe United States risks some exposure to China's economic slowdown and shipping disruptions in the Red Sea, but they appear contained, President Joe Biden's top economic adviser said on Friday, adding that the U.S. economy is "upbeat." Fri, 26 Jan 2024 16:54:00 GMT W2RA4JBBWFKSPL5PHC2WVMOWGU https://www.reuters.com/world/us/red-sea-china-risks-us-economy-seem-contained-white-house-says-2024-01-26/Trevor Hunnicutt世界美国
China Evergrande unit starts legal proceedings against parentEvergrande Property Services said on Friday its units have started legal proceedings against parent China Evergrande to recover 11.4 billion yuan ($1.59 billion) of pledge guarantees on deposit certificates. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 13:05:43 GMT BFEI5NQA65LURMIS754YRJZRYQ https://www.reuters.com/business/china-evergrande-unit-starts-legal-proceedings-against-parent-2024-01-26/Reuters商业
Israel's Ashdod port sees strategic risk from China during Gaza warIsrael's government-run port of Ashdod has complained that a rival Chinese-run terminal at the northern port of Haifa has become a strategic risk during the Gaza war. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 12:45:30 GMT HVAJGYHQSJPLLCO3BYLJUSG6JQ https://www.reuters.com/world/israels-ashdod-port-sees-strategic-risk-china-during-gaza-war-2024-01-26/Ari Rabinovitch, Jonathan Saul世界
Taiwan reports Chinese 'combat patrols' ahead of China-US talksTaiwan's defence ministry said it detected 23 Chinese air force planes operating around Taiwan and carrying out "joint combat readiness patrols" with Chinese warships on Friday, ahead of high-level China-U.S. talks in Thailand. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 11:24:38 GMT FOJ6OFWD6RPETDHFWU5UQYSSGY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-reports-chinese-combat-patrols-ahead-china-us-talks-2024-01-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
